channel.title: Posts on Hhui's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hhui's blog

item.title: oh my zsh安装记录
item.description: 安装zsh sudo apt install zsh 下载并使用zsh sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)" 下载powerlevel10k主题 # Linux git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/romkatv/powerlevel10k.git ~/powerlevel10k echo 'source ~/powerlevel10k/powerlevel10k.zsh-theme' >>~/.zshrc # Mac Homebrew brew install powerlevel10k echo "source $(brew --prefix)/share/powerlevel10k/powerlevel10k.zsh-theme" >>~/.zshrc 修改zsh配置文件使用p10k主题 ZSH_THEME="powerlevel10k/powerlevel10k" source ~/.zshrc 根据提示配置powerlevel10k 使用语法高亮插件 git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting.git ${ZSH_CUSTOM:-~/.oh-my-zsh/custom}/plugins/zsh-syntax-highlighting 使用命令建议插件 git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions ${ZSH_CUSTOM:-~/.oh-my-zsh/custom}/plugins/zsh-autosuggestions 修改zsh配置文件添加以上插件 plugins=(git zsh-syntax-highlighting zsh-autosuggestions) 应用修改 source ~/.zshrc

item.title: F2FS
item.description: F2FS是一个Linux文件系统，适用于闪存设备，论文的实验结果表明F2FS要比EXT4的性能好很多。

item.title: Block大小对F2FS的影响
item.description: 初略计算Block及node size对F2FS元数据和文件索引所占空间的影响。
